compounddef.innerclass: srsgnb::detail::is_llr_span_compatible< T, std::enable_if_t< std::is_convertible< T, span< log_likelihood_ratio > >::value||std::is_convertible< T, span< const log_likelihood_ratio > >::value > >

detaileddescription.para: Type used for representing log-likelihood ratios. Values are stored in an int8_t variable, but the sum operator is overloaded with a saturated sum, meaning that the result is clipped if it (absolutely) exceeds LLR_MAX.
